00233 template<typename TRANSACTOR> 
00234 inline void Connection::Perform(const TRANSACTOR &T,
00235                                 int Attempts)                           //[t4]
00236 {
00237   if (Attempts <= 0) return;
00238 
00239   bool Done = false;
00240 
00241   // Make attempts to perform T
00242   // TODO: Differentiate between db-related exceptions and other exceptions?
00243   do
00244   {
00245     --Attempts;
00246 
00247     // Work on a copy of T2 so we can restore the starting situation if need be
00248     TRANSACTOR T2(T);
00249     try
00250     {
00251       typename TRANSACTOR::argument_type X(*this, T2.Name());
00252       T2(X);
00253       X.Commit();
00254       Done = true;
00255     }
00256     catch (const in_doubt_error &)
00257     {
00258       // Not sure whether transaction went through or not.  The last thing in
00259       // the world that we should do now is retry.
00260       T2.OnDoubt();
00261       throw;
00262     }
00263     catch (const PGSTD::exception &e)
00264     {
00265       // Could be any kind of error.  
00266       T2.OnAbort(e.what());
00267       if (Attempts <= 0) throw;
00268       continue;
00269     }
00270     catch (...)
00271     {
00272       // Don't try to forge ahead if we don't even know what happened
00273       T2.OnAbort("Unknown exception");
00274       throw;
00275     }
00276 
00277     T2.OnCommit();
00278   } while (!Done);
00279 }
